name: You gotta get there
description:
Self-portrait game assignment.

This is about how I feel constantly chased by the deadlines I avoid by procrastinating.
Its annoying, feels broken and there is a pattern to it.
While at the same time the deadlines are what are pushing me forward.

(Use Esc to restart game)

Honestly I kinda like these hallway running games I'll make another one one day that actually has some better gameplay :)
